name: SpaceTeck
description:
SpaceTeck is a test where i learn godot engine and programing for fun. It is not a finished product and it is far from a good game but i feelt like showing it here anyways :)

To actually be able to play you will need to download the zip file and export both files :)

i do not own any of the assets used in the game, https://gamesupply.itch.io/ultimate-space-game-mega-asset-package here is the link to the creators of the asset pack.
